content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) receiving iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x2) receiving iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x1) receiving coal
- Stone furnace (position x2) receiving coal

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available and not currently processing items before inserting new materials.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract from the correct furnace and verify that the furnace has items to extract.

### Errors when updating inventory
- Regularly check inventory updates to ensure that the correct items are being tracked and that there are no discrepancies.
